title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: When the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects the option "Perform build automatically on resource modification", the "Build" action should not be enabled in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective. However, currently, the "Build" action is always enabled even after this setting is selected. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences -> Workbench.
EB: After selecting "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences -> Workbench, the "Build" action should be disabled in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences -> Workbench.
3. Select the option "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Right-click on a resource in the Java perspective.
5. Check if the "Build" action is still enabled in the context sensitive popup menu.
